item.title: About
item.description: My name is Thomas Chavakis. I’m a Software Engineer & Web Developer, specializing in designing large-scale web applications and microServices using GoLang and Microsoft Technologies. I currently work at Beat, while in the past I have worked for the software house of the Hellenic Navy and various software development companies. I have a BSc in Computer Science, an MSc in Advance Computing & Information Systems and an MSc in Space Applications & Technologies.
